content.rendered: Lamano Law Office is a woman owned and operated criminal defense firm located in Oakland, California. They protect individuals accused of crimes using a holistic approach influenced by restorative justice. They have 100% five-star reviews on Google and are rated #1 on Yelp for Criminal Defense Attorneys in Oakland California.
